metadata.name: Hiring Manager with Job Title
metadata.value: Carolyn Vespa - Senior Manager, Central Operations

title: Manager, ANZ NV Strategy & Operations
content:
About the Team
DoorDash is looking for top talent to play a pivotal role in growing our New Verticals business in New Zealand and Australia! We are looking for someone who is excited about joining a fast-paced environment and driving our next wave of growth. Join us in our global mission to empower and grow local economies!
About the Role
As a Manager on the ANZ International New Verticals S&O team, you will be responsible for launching our New Verticals business in New Zealand. You will drive localization of the New Zealand market to ensure a smooth and successful launch of our Convenience, Grocery, and Alcohol verticals in NZ. You will lead go-to-market activities to unlock the New Zealand market for our New Verticals business, dive into data to monitor performance and root cause any issues, and work cross-functionally with account management, sales, product, legal, and comms teams to drive growth and profitability.  
You will report into the ANZ New Verticals General Manager.
You’re excited about this opportunity because you will…
Strategize - Work on unique strategies across our three-sided marketplace, identifying product-market fit for our New Verticals business in New Zealand
Build – Implement scalable initiatives and best practices to build a world-class New Vertical operation in NZ from the ground up
Analyze – Leverage data whenever possible to inform your hypothesis as well as build models using tools like Excel and SQL to evaluate the economic and strategic costs and benefits of various programs and experiments
Influence – Partner with many teams like: Account Management, Sales, Product, Engineering, Legal, Policy, Comms, etc. to create strategic plans and harness opportunities while gaining buy-in from stakeholders and leadership
We’re excited about you because…
6+ years' experience in consulting, strategy, or related operational experience
You are a self-starter – You have a bias for action and are able to thrive in a fast-paced, constantly changing environment
You are a problem solver – You have a talent for synthesising complex problems, can translate high-level goals into actionable plans, and enjoy implementing a process
You are analytical – You use data to inform tough decisions, and are comfortable operating at both the 10,000 foot level and at the 10 inch level
You are an owner – You're always looking for opportunities to better your work product and own the outcome – both the good and the bad
About DoorDash
At DoorDash, our mission to empower local economies shapes how our team members move quickly, learn, and reiterate in order to make impactful decisions that display empathy for our range of users—from Dashers to merchant partners to consumers. We are a technology and logistics company that started with door-to-door delivery, and we are looking for team members who can help us go from a company that is known for delivering food to a company that people turn to for any and all goods. DoorDash is growing rapidly and changing constantly, which gives our team members the opportunity to share their unique perspectives, solve new challenges, and own their careers. We're committed to supporting employees’ happiness, healthiness, and overall well-being by providing comprehensive benefits and perks.
Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel. 
If you need any accommodations, please inform your recruiting contact upon initial connection.

demographic_questions.description:
Voluntary Self-Identification

As described in our Applicant Privacy Notice, we ask candidates to respond to the below self-identification survey. Completion of the form is entirely voluntary. Whatever your decision, it will not be considered in the hiring process or thereafter. Any information that you do provide will be recorded and maintained in a confidential file.

As set forth in DoorDash’s Equal Employment Opportunity policy, we do not discriminate on the basis of any protected group status under any applicable law.

For race and ethnicity definitions, as well as more information on protected veteran and disability status, please refer to this page.

questions.label: Race (*Please select one option that best describes how you identify*)

answer_options.label: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
I am one or more of the classifications of protected veterans
I am not a protected veteran
Yes, I have (or have previously had) a disability
No, I don’t have a disability

questions.label: Please select your current status regarding your eligibility to work in New Zealand.

values.label: I have unrestricted work rights in New Zealand.
I have restricted work rights in New Zealand.
I do not currently have the right to work in New Zealand.
I am a current DoorDash Dasher
I am a current DoorDash employee
I have not worked at DoorDash

questions.description: We would like to provide you with an overview of how we process your personal information. Please take the time to read the Applicant Privacy Notice and confirm that you have read and understand the content.
questions.label: Applicant Privacy Acknowledgement
We would like to contact you via SMS or WhatsApp to provide updates on your progress. Mark yes if you agree. If you mark no, we will contact you via the email you provided.
